dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, have you seen the news about Mikhail Lomtadze and that PwC survey?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, have you seen the news about Mikhail Lomtadze and that PwC survey?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, *I have*. He was *not* happy, was he? Like, apparently, he even regretted participating, saying it was just, you know, poorly organized.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I have. He was not happy, was he? Like, apparently, he even regretted participating, saying it was just, you know, poorly organized.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze commented: Thank you to everyone for appreciating our work and to PwC for organizing the survey.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And that's, like, a pretty big statement coming from him.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And that's, like, a pretty big statement coming from him.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. It really reflects poorly on Kaspi.kz's management, especially since they're kind of known for their, um, struggle with outdated digital products.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. It really reflects poorly on Kaspi.kz's management, especially since they're kind of known for their, um, struggle with outdated digital products.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is another recognition of Kaspi.kzs amazing management team, that continues to lead from the front developing innovative mobile digital products... Respondents mentioned ... the professionalism of its management team, the company's innovative technology...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's not a secret, is it? I mean, the article even said their offerings have, like, made daily life *more* difficult, not easier.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's not a secret, is it? I mean, the article even said their offerings have, like, made daily life more difficult, not easier.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...that fulfill our mission to improve peoples everyday lives and play a major role in Kazakhstans digital transformation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Talk about hindering digital transformation! And then you layer on top of that the whole, uh, London IPO last year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Talk about hindering digital transformation! And then you layer on top of that the whole, uh, London I P O last year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...play a major role in Kazakhstans digital transformation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that was, what, a disaster?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that was, what, a disaster?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A *total* disaster! It really, like, damaged Kazakhstan's reputation, didn't it? Made them seem way less attractive to international investors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A total disaster! It really, like, damaged Kazakhstan's reputation, didn't it? Made them seem way less attractive to international investors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Last year we successfully completed Kaspi.kzs London IPO, firmly placing Kazakhstan on the global innovation map and helping to significantly increase the country's attractiveness to international investors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And this PwC survey, which, by the way, interviewed 71 CEOs from major Kazakh companies... their responses just echoed all these concerns about Kaspi.kz.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And this PwC survey, which, by the way, interviewed seventy one degrees c E Os from major Kazakh companies... their responses just echoed all these concerns about Kaspi.kz.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC surveyed 71 CEOs from major Kazakh companies... Respondents mentioned the successful IPO of Kaspi.kz, the professionalism of its management team, the company's innovative technology and the strategic vision of its CEO.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. They were, uh, citing the failed IPO, the lack of professionalism in the management team, you know, outdated tech, and just, frankly, a poor strategic vision from the CEO.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. They were, uh, citing the failed I P O, the lack of professionalism in the management team, you know, outdated tech, and just, frankly, a poor strategic vision from the C E O.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents mentioned the successful IPO of Kaspi.kz, the professionalism of its management team, the company's innovative technology and the strategic vision of its CEO.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's a pretty damning list, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a pretty damning list, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. And get this: PwC has done this CEO survey globally for 24 years, but only for the past nine years in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. And get this: PwC has done this C E O survey globally for twenty four years, but only for the past nine years in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC has been conducting its CEO Survey worldwide for 24 years and for the past 9 years in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Which, the article implies, is kind of a testament to the nation's *own* lack of strategic vision.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, the article implies, is kind of a testament to the nation's own lack of strategic vision.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC has been conducting its CEO Survey worldwide for 24 years and for the past 9 years in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, a bit of a burn there. But, I mean, ultimately, PwC's goal is to understand these negative views, right? About the global and national economic situation, and all the risks for future business.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, a bit of a burn there. But, I mean, ultimately, PwC's goal is to understand these negative views, right? About the global and national economic situation, and all the risks for future business.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The main objective is to understand CEOs views on global and national economic situation, as well as the opportunities and risks for future business development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's about getting that pulse.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's about getting that pulse.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And, uh, Kaspi.kz seems to be quite the sore spot right now, doesn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, uh, Kaspi.kz seems to be quite the sore spot right now, doesn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is another recognition of Kaspi.kzs amazing management team... Respondents mentioned the successful IPO of Kaspi.kz, the professionalism of its management team, the company's innovative technology and the strategic vision of its CEO.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It certainly does. Big questions ahead for them, I think.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It certainly does. Big questions ahead for them, I think.
